card.text: Trample Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater toughness than Plebian Laborer, put a +1/+1 counter on Plebian Laborer.

card.name: Martial Tribune
card.text: Martial Tribune has trample and vigilance as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Decorated Titan
card.text: Trample When Decorated Titan enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with toughness greater than its power.

card.name: Hero of Sindos
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.

card.name: Fraulian Decimator
card.text: Glory (Whenever this attacks, you get {V}, a glory counter, then you may activate this card's glory ability.) {V}| Fraulian Decimator gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of {V} you've spent this turn.

card.name: Crocota Shadowstalker
card.text: Deathtouch When Crocota Shadowstalker enters the battlefield, distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of creatures you control, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Ad Bestias
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped creature you control with power X or greater. Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value X.

card.name: In Corpore Sano
card.text: When In Corpore Sano enters the battlefield, you take imperium. (Creatures you cast enter the battlefield with an extra +1/+1 counter. You lose imperium at the end of your turn if you didn't attack or cast a creature spell.) If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

card.name: Hunt Far and Wide
card.text: Create an X/X green Beast creature token, where X is the greatest toughness among creatures you control.

card.name: Bestial Primacy

card.name: Men Forget, History Recalls
card.text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If you hold imperium, instead return up to two target permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Men Forget, History Recalls.

card.text: As Praetorian Guard enters the battlefield, create a Pilum Arms token attached to it. (It's an Equipment with "Equipped creature gets +1/+1" and equip {3}. Attaching an Arms to a creature unattaches any others.) Equipped creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Lost Legionary

card.name: Naumachian Defeat

card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control with glory attack, you get an additional {V}.

card.name: Quincunx Patera
card.text: Spells cost five mana to cast. (Increase costs lower than five with generic mana. Reduce costs higher than five first by generic mana, then by colored mana. This effect can't reduce colored costs to below one mana of any color.)

card.name: Necrodominance

card.name: Emperor's Demise
card.text: Emperor's Demise deals 4 damage to any target. If excess damage is dealt this way, create that many Treasure tokens. If that excess damage is 6 or greater, you may cast a spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Provincial Magistrate
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if you weren't dealt combat damage this turn, create a 2/1 white Advisor creature token.

card.name: Colosseum Exemplar

card.name: Caesar's Jurist

card.name: Scourge of Fraulia
